summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2437, for the improvement of North 80th Street and North 81st Street, each from Woodland Park Avenue to Greenwood Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25899 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
